channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Don’t use ‘boilerplate’ reasons to justify big executive pay rises, UK firms warned
item.description: Investment Association, influential group of shareholders, urges pay committees to avoid ‘benchmarking’ The UK’s largest listed companies have been wa...

item.title: Brown University shooting: person of interest in custody after attack leaves two students dead – latest updates
item.description: Person arrested is in their 30s, Providence police chief says, but did not reveal if they were connected to Ivy League university Person of interest d...

item.title: Want job security in the age of AI? Get a state license – any state license
item.description: The coming tech boom is about to launch a boom in people who do things with their hands and minds When I was in college and didn’t know what to do wit...

item.title: Bondi beach terror attack: 12 people killed in ‘evil antisemitic’ shooting at park in Australia
item.description: Police say one alleged shooter among dead, with second arrested and in a critical condition, after attack on Jewish festival in Sydney Bondi beach sho...

item.title: Bondi beach shooting live updates: terror attack at Jewish festival kills 11, with one gunman dead and another wounded
item.description: Further 29 people in hospital, after attack on Sydney beach where Hanukah event was taking place Bondi beach terror attack: full report What we know s...

item.title: King 'appalled and saddened' by Bondi attack on Jewish community
item.description: At least 11 people were killed and a further 29 injured in the shooting during Hanukkah celebrations.

item.title: 'It was pandemonium': Jewish community targeted in Australia's deadliest shooting in decades
item.description: At least 11 people were killed and more than two dozen injured, including a child, according to police.

item.title: What we know so far about the Brown University shooting
item.description: Police are searching for the suspect after a gunman opened fire in a classroom, killing two and injuring nine others in Providence, Rhode Island.

item.title: 'Person of interest' detained over Brown University shooting, police say
item.description: Two people died and nine others were injured in the incident in Rhode Island on Saturday.

item.title: More than 700 migrants crossed Channel on Saturday
item.description: Home Office figures show 737 people arrived in Dover on 11 boats after a four-week gap in crossings.
